SEARCH
Package bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model

Class FlightBookingSystem

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.FlightBookingSystem
public class FlightBookingSystem extends Object
The FlightBookingSystem class manages the core functionality of a flight booking system. It maintains collections of customers, flights, and bookings, and provides methods to add, retrieve, update, and delete customers, flights, and bookings. It also includes methods to retrieve system date, customer details, flight details, and perform operations like adding, deleting bookings, and retrieving passengers by flight.
Author:
Sujal Manandhar

    • addBookingByIds

      public void addBookingByIds(int cusId, int flightId, LocalDate bookingDate) throws bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.main.FlightBookingSystemException
      Adds a booking to the system based on customer ID, flight ID, and booking date.
      Parameters:
      cusId - The ID of the customer making the booking.
      flightId - The ID of the flight for which booking is made.
      bookingDate - The date on which the booking is made.
      Throws:
      bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.main.FlightBookingSystemException - If the customer or flight does not exist, or if the flight has no remaining seats.

    • updateCustomer

      public void updateCustomer(int id, String name, String phoneNum, String email) throws bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.main.FlightBookingSystemException
      Updates customer details in the system.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the customer to update.
      name - The new name of the customer (optional).
      phoneNum - The new phone number of the customer (optional).
      email - The new email of the customer (optional).
      Throws:
      bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.main.FlightBookingSystemException - If no customer exists with the provided ID.

    • updateFlight

      public void updateFlight(int id, int numOfSeats, int price) throws bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.main.FlightBookingSystemException
      Updates flight details in the system.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the flight to update.
      numOfSeats - The new number of seats of the flight.
      price - The new price of the flight.
      Throws:
      bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.main.FlightBookingSystemException - If no flight exists with the provided ID, or if the number of seats or price is invalid.

    • cancelBooking

      public void cancelBooking(int cusId, int flightId) throws bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.main.FlightBookingSystemException
      Cancels a booking based on customer ID and flight ID.
      Parameters:
      cusId - The ID of the customer whose booking is to be canceled.
      flightId - The ID of the flight for which the booking is to be canceled.
      Throws:
      bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.main.FlightBookingSystemException - If no booking is found for the provided customer and flight IDs.

    • updateBooking

      public void updateBooking(int cusId, int flightId, int new_flightId, LocalDate newbookingDate) throws bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.main.FlightBookingSystemException
      Updates an existing booking with new flight ID and booking date.
      Parameters:
      cusId - The ID of the customer whose booking is to be updated.
      flightId - The ID of the flight to update the booking with.
      new_flightId - The new ID of the flight for the booking.
      newbookingDate - The new booking date for the booking.
      Throws:
      bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.main.FlightBookingSystemException - If no booking is found for the provided customer and flight IDs, or if the new flight ID does not exist in the system.
